message: Does anybody have a storyform for The Dead Poet's Society or The Hunt For Red October? I can't find them on the site.
As far as I know there aren't any. I'm not sure Red October is a complete story. It's close but I vaguely remember last time I watched it was missing some stuff.

Got it. I assumed RO had a storyform because Jack Ryan is prominently featured as a female-mental-sex male MC.

As for DPS, I'm curious. It seems to have a very small MC thread (Ethan Hawke) and a very well defined SS.
